verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> If <WH3588> a woman <WH802> have conceived <WH2232> seed, <WH2233> and born <WH3205> a man <WH2145> child: then she shall be unclean <WH2930> seven <WH7651> days; <WH3117> according to the days <WH3117> of the separation <WH5079> for her infirmity <WH1738> shall she be unclean. <WH2930>
And in the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190> shall be circumcised. <WH4135>

And she shall then continue <WH3427> in the blood <WH1818> of her purifying <WH2893> three <WH7969> and thirty <WH7970> days; <WH3117> she shall touch <WH5060> no <WH3808> hallowed <WH6944> thing, nor <WH3808> come <WH935> into <WH413> the sanctuary, <WH4720> until <WH5704> the days <WH3117> of her purifying <WH2892> be fulfilled. <WH4390>

But if <WH518> she bear <WH3205> a maid <WH5347> child, then she shall be unclean <WH2930> two weeks, <WH7620> as in her separation: <WH5079> and she shall continue <WH3427> in the blood <WH1818> of her purifying <WH2893> three score <WH8346> and six <WH8337> days. <WH3117>

And when the days <WH3117> of her purifying <WH2892> are fulfilled, <WH4390> for a son, <WH1121> or for a daughter, <WH1323> she shall bring <WH935> a lamb <WH3532> of the first <WH1121> year <WH8141> for a burnt <WH5930> offering, and a young <WH1121> pigeon, <WH3123> or <WH176> a turtledove, <WH8449> for a sin <WH2403> offering, to the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> to the priest: <WH3548>

Who shall offer <WH7126> it before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and make an atonement <WH3722> for her; and she shall be cleansed <WH2891> from the issue <WH4726> of her blood. <WH1818> This <WH2063> is the law <WH8451> for her that has born <WH3205> a male <WH2145> or <WH176> a female. <WH5347>

And if <WH518> she be not able <WH4672> <WH1767> to bring <WH4672> a lamb, <WH7716> then she shall bring <WH3947> two <WH8147> turtles, <WH8449> or <WH176> two <WH8147> young <WH1121> pigeons; <WH3123> the one <WH259> for the burnt <WH5930> offering, and the other <WH259> for a sin <WH2403> offering: and the priest <WH3548> shall make an atonement <WH3722> for her, and she shall be clean. <WH2891>
